All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Demonstrate javaFx application which retrieve the weather information for today and also forecast the weather information for next six days on given location.
DarkSkyWeatherService
Used https://www.weatherapi.com/api-explorer.aspx API to retrieve the weather data and implement method to get all the data
Day
https://api.tutiempo.net/de/json.html Here we define all the attribute that is needed to check weather and fetch the information from API by comparing the attribute.
IWeatherService
useful methods to this interface to retrieve weather information
SevenDayWeather
This class convert JSon data into a readable format and also fetch the data what we needed from JSon.
